name: Special pay plan; authority established; participation
text:
[§88D-2]  Special pay plan; authority established; participation.  (a)  Each jurisdiction may establish a special pay plan for its employees.
     (b)  Eligibility and participation in a special pay plan shall be determined by each jurisdiction; provided that the plan shall be:
     (1)  In accordance with chapter 89, for employees subject to a collective bargaining agreement; and
     (2)  Mandatory for employees not subject to a collective bargaining agreement employed in a jurisdiction that has elected to establish a special pay plan. [L 2003, c 109, pt of §2]
